content.en: Meet us in Copenhagen on Friday April 7th afternoon to discuss about our web crawler Hyphe! The médialab engineers developing Hyphe (Paul Girard, Mathieu Jacomy, Benjamin Ooghe-Tabanou and Guillaume Plique) are working at the TANT-Lab of Aalborg University in Copenhagen from April 2nd to 7th. During the last afternoon they will present the result of their coding retreat and open a discussion about Hyphe, its source code, its usage, and its future. Time: Friday April 7th from 15:00 to 17:00 Place: Aalborg University in Copenhagen (to be precised) Hyphe is developed thanks to the DIME-SHS Equipex (ANR-10-EQPX-19-01)
